arts.ttl: Freiburg still hopeful of a ‘special season’ following spectacular comeback victory against Stuttgart
arts.sum: SC Freiburg head coach Julian Schuster and SCF defender Mathias Ginter expressed hope that their club had turned an important corner after a spectacular Saturday afternoon comeback win.

arts.ttl: Igor Matanović inspires stunning Freiburg comeback with debut brace against VfB Stuttgart
arts.sum: Freiburg secured their first Bundesliga win of the season with a dramatic 3-1 comeback victory over VfB Stuttgart, inspired by substitute Igor Matanović's brace on his debut. Igor Matanović sealed Freiburg's 3-1 victory with a confidently taken penalty in stoppage time, capping a dream debut for the summer signing.

arts.ttl: SC Freiburg vs. VfB Stuttgart preview: Freiburg look to kickstart season in Baden-Schwaben clash
arts.sum: Freiburg are looking to pick up their first points of the Bundesliga season this weekend, as they take on Stuttgart in an all-Baden-Württemberg clash.
